description:
Suzuki Gorou is an old politician, who died from cancer before arriving in the Gantz room, before the start of the Onion Alien mission. He leaves the others after being sent out to the mission area, deciding to walk home.
His head explodes when he left the boundary of the mission. Kurono spots his corpse while walking Kishimoto home the same route, and figures out what the ringing in their head means, and backs away.
name: Suzuki Gorou
